name: It's All About Horses T-shirts
description:
From the "Live Your Passion" line, comes these super soft 100% combed, ring spun cotton tees.  Perfect gift for the horse lover in your life.  These were specially designed by Araya, an avid horse lover and equestrian.  

A portion of our proceeds goes to animal rescue.

name: Peace T-shirts
description:
From the "Live Your Passion" line, comes these super soft 100% combed, ring spun cotton tees.  This shirt has a cool peace design and our signature 'live your passion' logo on the back hip side.

A portion of our proceeds goes to animal rescue.

name: Tanks
description:
The "Live Your Passion" tanks come in 2 designs; pictured, our peace logo and It's All About Horses.  The tanks are super cozy 100% ribbed cotton.  The All About Horses tank was designed by Araya, an avid horse lover and equestrian, and is perfect for the horse lover in your life!

Don't forget horse lovers, this tank comes in It's All About Horses, too!

A portion of our proceeds goes to animal rescue.

name: Tote Bags
description:
This fabulous It's All About Horses tote lets everyone know you're a horse lover!  Made from 100% cotton, this multi-purpose tote is a natural flecked color and is over 22" wide and 17" high.  It holds a ton of goodies and wears well.  Horse lovers are guaranteed to get a lot of use out of this wonderful tote that is quite light but heavy duty!


A portion of our proceeds goes to animal rescue.

name: Stable Days The Road to Jumping DVD
description: Come jump inside Araya's world as she follows her passion for horseback riding. In award-winning Stable Days, we follow Araya as she explores what it takes to be a true equestrian. From grooming and tacking up, to training and showing, Araya will take you through the day to day trials and tribulations of being a rider. Along the way you will encounter araya's stable mates, learn fun facts, meet her trainer and get a first hand look at what it takes to care for a horse, train and prepare for show day. From Glamour to grit, Stable Days will teach you life long lessons of dedication, determination and discipline all from a kids point of view.
